revised_title: The Role of Fixed Nitrogen in Atmospheric Photochemistry and Climate Change
tldr: This article discusses the role of fixed nitrogen in atmospheric photochemistry and its impact on climate change. It highlights the various sources of atmospheric nitrogen, including combustion processes, subsonic aircraft emissions, and biomass burning. The article also explores the consequences of increased atmospheric nitrogen levels on stratospheric chemistry and climate.
